MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Poplar Project in North America dated March 2012.pdf

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Poplar Project in North America dated March 2012.pdf
document.description: This document is a technical report prepared for Lions Gate Metals Inc. detailing the results of the 2011 infill drill campaign and updating the resource estimate for the Poplar copper-molybdenum porphyry deposit located in British Columbia.
